events.message: Applicant has submitted the mortgage loan application for purchasing a new house in the suburbs.
The application was reviewed and classified under mortgage loans according to the stated purpose.
A loan officer specializing in home loans has been assigned to manage the applicant's case.
Initial review of income and credit history has been conducted for the mortgage loan application.
Applicant is requested to provide proof of income, property-related documents, and identification papers.
Applicant has submitted all the necessary documents including property deed and salary slips.
Credit bureau report was obtained and analyzed to check the applicant’s creditworthiness.
Risk assessment of the mortgage loan was performed considering property value and income stability.
A mortgage loan offer including interest rate, tenure, and repayment schedule has been presented.
Applicant has reviewed the loan offer and expressed interest in proceeding with the terms provided.
The application was escalated to the underwriting team for further verification and approval.
Mortgage loan application has been approved after successful underwriting and risk evaluation.
The approved mortgage loan amount has been disbursed to the borrower’s designated account.
Follow-up with the applicant was conducted to ensure receipt of funds and address any queries.
The mortgage loan application process was officially closed after all formalities were completed.
